question: What is the name of the Forum that would be launched ahead of the SCO trade ministers meeting?
explanation:
The first of its kind SCO (Shanghai Cooperation Organisation) Startup Forum would be launched on 27th October 2020. This is scheduled just ahead of the SCO trade ministers meeting to be held on 28th October.
The forum would create a platform for multilateral cooperation among the SCO Member States to develop their startup ecosystems. Presently there are 8 member countries in SCO. India is a full time member of SCO since 2017.
